lyrics.text:
’Oku lahi ‘a e Eiki,
Ko hotau ‘Otua,
Pea lahi ‘ene ngāue,
Pea mahu’inga.

He na’a ne fakatupu,
‘I he’ene poto;
‘A e me’a ‘i ‘olunga,
Mo lalo ni foki.

Pea ‘oku tu’u ma’u ai pē,
‘A ‘ene ngāue,
Ko hono faka’ilonga,
Tukufakaholo.

Ko e me’a kotoa pē,
‘Oku ‘i ‘olunga,
‘Oku kau ke faka’ilo,
‘A ‘ene ‘Afio.

Hangē ‘oku lea hifo,
Pea tala pehē,
Ko e ngāue ‘a e ‘Eiki,
‘A kimautolu ni.
